body_html:
Could be #3883. I've seen some double frees while trying to debug that but this could be something else. @laiviet could you please provide some of the following information:

  1. PyTorch version, CUDA version, output of nvidia-smi
  2. A script that reproduces the crash. It would be great if this were as small as possible.

body:
Could be #3883. I've seen some double frees while trying to debug that but this could be something else. @laiviet could you please provide some of the following information:

1. PyTorch version, CUDA version, output of `nvidia-smi`
2. A script that reproduces the crash. It would be great if this were as small as possible.
